New Records: Shubman Gill scored a record-breaking ton
India registered the biggest win after Gill’s record-breaking ton
Key Match Events: Shubman Gill's century powered India to a 168-run victory
Hardik Pandya took a magical spell to help India win the series
Pre-Game Insights: The curator was sacked from his role following the second T20 match between India and New Zealand
Better conditions await in Ahmedabad before India go on T20I hiatus
Post-Match Reflections: Hardik Pandya downplayed his influence and credited the support staff for the team’s showing
Pandya was named Player of the Series for his all-round efforts
Miscellaneous Highlights: The wicket in Lucknow was called out in the aftermath of the contest by India skipper Hardik Pandya, who labeled the pitch a ‘shocker’
The surface in Lucknow offered a lot of turn to spinners, who bowled 30 of the 39.5 overs, and not a single six was hit
Others: India cruised to a 168-run victory over New Zealand in Ahmedabad to claim the T20I series
Reports emerged that the curator was sacked from his role following the second T20 match between India and New Zealand
